releaseNotes: (IMPORTANT) Please update the app in order to start enjoying the content!
[Update] We've Moved To A Bigger & Better Server Now
[Fix] Fixed Several Tiny Bugs & Took Performance Measurements

Note: If you can't update the app from current version, then please delete old apks present in /storage/RedFlix TV/Update/update.apk (all) first and then re-download the apk by clicking the update button
